full_summary:
**Title and Description**

*   **Tender Title**: Facilities Maintenance and Support Services for CFS St. John’s (NL)
*   **Description**: Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites proposals from qualified firms to provide facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) for installations located in CFS St. John’s and Outlying Areas, NL.

**Procurement Information**

*   **Reference Number**: MX-22608420119
*   **Solicitation Number**: SJ322871-78577
*   **Publication Date**: November 2, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 12, 2022, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: None specified
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

**Contract Details**

*   **Estimate Contract Value**: $7,273,000.00 (including optional periods, Prime Cost Allowances, and a one-time mobilization payment)
*   **Contract Duration**: Up to 7 years (3 years with options for 2 two-year extensions)
*   **Services Required**: Facilities maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure within the defined property limits

**Procedures and Requirements**

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Security Requirements**: Identified in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents
*   **Site Visits**: Two non-mandatory site visits will be held on November 15 and 16, 2022

**Evaluation Criteria**

*   Proposals will be evaluated using the established criteria in the RFP document.

**Bidding and Documentation**

*   Bidding and documents are available on Merx.com.
*   Fees may apply; see [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

**Contact Information**

*   Mark Smith, contact information: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca), 613-859-0549
*   Defence Construction Canada website: Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada ([dcc-cdc.gc.ca](http://dcc-cdc.gc.ca)) 
*   Note: this
